instructions.description: The first Mokoko Seed is on the ground, near the burning blazer.
This Mokoko seed is in a patch of grass near the path.
This Mokoko seed is resting between a tree and some large rocks.
3 Mokoko Seeds can be found after defeating the crab boss. Near the burning blazer is a rock wall, you should be able to walk right through it to the end, then you will see the 3 seeds.
The last Mokoko seed can be found here near some rocks on the left.
